name: adjunct_aw_tableize_roi_info.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: A simple helper function for the fat_proc scripts that generates a text file containing ROI count/size information based on provided atlases and masks.

inputs.description: Warped atlas of interest, with subbrick selector if necessary
inputs.name: Warped atlas

inputs.description: Mask for the warped atlas (same grid)
inputs.name: Warped atlas mask

inputs.description: Reference atlas (unwarped), with subbrick selector if necessary
inputs.name: Reference atlas

inputs.description: Mask for the reference atlas (same grid)
inputs.name: Reference atlas mask

inputs.description: Modesmooth value, from modal smoothing used after warping
inputs.name: Modesmooth value

output-files.description: Text file containing ROI count/size information
output-files.name: Output file
